0100111001010110 0101101100111011 0 -> sum: 1010100110010001, cout: 0
0010010101010010 1010011101100010 1 -> sum: 1100110010110101, cout: 0
1000010111000010 0101111110100100 0 -> sum: 1110010101100110, cout: 0
0010011110111110 1101001100001011 1 -> sum: 1111101011001010, cout: 0
1011111100011100 1000100100000101 0 -> sum: 0100100000100001, cout: 1
0101100110011111 0010000111100011 0 -> sum: 0111101110000010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
